title: Rahu Transit in the 3rd House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 3rd house for Scorpio Ascendant, courage, communication, and self-initiative intensify in unconventional ways. This phase boosts bold expression, experimentation in skills, and a strong urge to assert ideas. Writing, media, marketing, and tech-related pursuits gain momentum. However, impulsive speech, rivalry with siblings, or risky decisions can create friction. Channeling curiosity into disciplined action brings breakthroughs. Used wisely, this transit enhances influence, adaptability, and the confidence to pursue independent paths.

sections.title: Career
points: Media, writing, sales, or tech accelerate

closing: This Rahu transit amplifies courage and expression. With discipline, it becomes a powerful phase for independent growth and influence.
